title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       Videos Many of the park's newer videos (post-2014), are posted on our YouTube channel. Organized by theme, you can view short films and clips on astronomy, wildlife, and outside impacts. On our park website, you can view several short podcast-style videos about the Elkhorn Ranch, made in 2009. This page also contains an audio tour with information about the site. Our educational film "Finding Roosevelt," designed for elementary teachers and students, is also available as a great virtual tour of the Maltese Cross Cabin. Other Content An interactive diary offers an excellent way to browse quotes from Theodore Roosevelt about his thoughts on nature, conservation, and living in the Badlands.
